conclusion: Need to understand direction and intensity of light and interaction with objects and surface
Shadow of black and white object (A) is cast to the right and slightly forward
Light source is from the front and slightly to the right for shadow A
Shadow of the mirror (B) is cast to the right and slightly forward
Light source is from the front and slightly to the right for shadow B
Shadow of the ring (C) is cast to the right and slightly forward
Light source is from the front and slightly to the right for shadow C
Shadow of the avocado (D) is cast to the right and slightly forward
Light source is from the front and slightly to the right for shadow D
New light source is moved to the back left
Light will now be coming from the back and slightly to the left
Shadow of black and white object (A) will move to the front and slightly to the left
Shadow of the mirror (B) will move to the front and slightly to the left
Shadow of the ring (C) will move to the front and slightly to the left
Shadow of the avocado (D) will move to the front and slightly to the left
Final shadow positions for A, B, C, and D will be to the front and slightly to the left
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C, and D will all move to the front and slightly to the left
